content: m backwards loop co https //www youtube com/watch v=ojou7bco4dm nearly invisible increase https //techknitting blogspot com/2007/05/very-nearly-invisible-increase html picking up stitches from the centre of fabric https //youtu be/ediln5ok4be si=yjsxwnfdrguxb4w2 three-needle join https //youtu be/cbhvf5ve3u0 si=00nrdtjhdqgj_glz avoiding underarm holes https //youtu be/8k-ismdthk0 si=dsc0imm_ktd6afnu combination knitting for clean ribbing optional https //youtu be/fo8xrscfzxm si=3fztsvkakk4akefr stretchy folded collar https //youtu be/djvkt48fmx8 si=xngwamftqvjvwptr sewing in a zipper https //youtu be/as2gz-r7598 si=ar1rfvpnsnn2gnyq - 3 - g lo s s a r y st s stitch es k knit p purl co cast on bobble bind off rs right side of work primarily knit stitches ws wrong side primarily purl stitches pm place marker sm slip marker incr increase m1r pick up the bar between 2 sts from back to front with the left-hand needle and knit it on the ws purl it +1 st m1l pick up the bar between 2 sts from front to back with the left-hand needle and knit it through the back loop on the ws purl it through the back loop +1 st k2tog knit 2 sts together -1 st k2togtbl knit 2 sts together through the back loop insert the right needle through the back loop of the 1st then 2nd st then knit -1 st p2tog purl 2 sts together insert the right needle purlwise into the front loops then wrap the yarn around as when purling and pull it through -1 st p2togtbl purl 2 sts together through the back loop insert the right needle behind the left needle through the back loop of the 2nd then the 1st st then purl -1 st - 4 - b o dy for this section use 3mm needles and the thicker yarn - 5 - b o dy using 3mm needles co 68 72 78 sts 1 front 1 raglan 16 17 18 sleeve 1 raglan 30 32 36 back 1 raglan 16 17 18 sleeve 1 raglan 1 front and pm before each raglan st round 1 ws p round 2 rs k until first marker work first raglan incr m1r sm k1 raglan st m1l repeat for other raglan sts repeat round 1 and 2 additionally work a neckline incr at the beginning and end of round 4 6 18 in total 8x to shape the neckline k first st m1l continue in pattern m1r k last st round 18 rs work the last neckline incr to finish shaping the neckline co 7 8 10 sts after working the last st of the row backwards loop co1 round 19 ws p co 7 8 10 sts after working the last st of the row repeat round 1 and 2 round 30 36 44 rs from this row onward do not work all m1r/m1l of the raglan incr on every rs row for the front and back sections work m1r/m1l for 3 rs row then skip 1 rs row for the sleeve sections work m1r/m1l for 1 rs row then skip 1 rs row after round 82 90
